programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf) S2 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2) S2 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2»Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Chores List) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Chores List»The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La boîte à secrets) S1 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La boîte à secrets»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cerf-volant) S1 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Alison au Pays des merveilles) S5 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Alison au Pays des merveilles»Mail Carrier Molly is trying to deliver a Friendship Day card for someone named Alison in a place called Wonderland. But to do so, she'll have to get past the card-stealing Queen of Hearts, who has banned Friendship Day across the land!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !) S1 (1/17)
programme.desc: «Bienvenue chez Josh et Blue !»Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Cecilia And the Ghost Ship) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Cecilia And the Ghost Ship»Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Sleeping Like a Baby) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Sleeping Like a Baby»Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Prank) S1 (23/28)
programme.desc: «Shark Prank»Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bus scolaire / Les mésanges charbonnières) S3 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Le bus scolaire / Les mésanges charbonnières»When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les écureuils) S2 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les écureuils»Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une nuit mouvementée) S4 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Une nuit mouvementée»Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Surprise) S1 (n°43)
programme.desc: «The Surprise»They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Paperplane Race) S1 (n°44)
programme.desc: «The Paperplane Race»Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies) S8 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies»Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le mambo des Hippos) S3 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Le mambo des Hippos»Raimundo's dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler) S2 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler»Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Mail Whale Tale) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Mail Whale Tale»When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (n°45)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Funny Sounds) S1 (n°46)
programme.desc: «Funny Sounds»When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. But no sound seem to suit Christopher, who has a hard time accepting the loss of them.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île déserte) S4 (28/52)
programme.desc: «L'île déserte»Peppa and George are at Danny Dog's house and Captain Dog is telling the kids stories of the time when he was a sailor. He declares that he will never step on a boat again. Grandad Dog, Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit are going on a fishing trip and the Captain refuses to join them. But the three of them get lost at sea because no one is steering the boat. They get stranded on a desert island, so Captain Dog has no choice but to get on a boat to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes»Papa Pig is a bit cranky because he lost his glasses. Peppa and George are going to look for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Blaze et le génie de la lampe) S4 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Blaze et le génie de la lampe»Blaze and AJ are driving through the desert when they meet a magical Genie who loves to grant wishes! But when the Genie loses the jewels that give him his powers, Blaze and AJ go on a quest to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pirate Musical!) S6 (20/23)
programme.desc: «Pirate Musical!»In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons»The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Plantae Putridus / Le singe de l'espace) S3 (10/26)
programme.desc: «La Plantae Putridus / Le singe de l'espace»"Mayor Humdinger drops off a 'gift' to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms.Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol. // A UFO has just splashed down in the bay! When Ryder and the pups pop the hatch, they find a monkey astronaut with a broken spacecraft and no way back into space. It's the Paw Patrol to the rescue!".

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fizzy Frenzy) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Fizzy Frenzy»Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf) S2 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2) S2 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2»Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La boîte à secrets) S1 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La boîte à secrets»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.desc: «Alison au Pays des merveilles»Mail Carrier Molly is trying to deliver a Friendship Day card for someone named Alison in a place called Wonderland. But to do so, she'll have to get past the card-stealing Queen of Hearts, who has banned Friendship Day across the land!

programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.desc: «Cecilia And the Ghost Ship»Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship.

programme.desc: «Sleeping Like a Baby»Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.desc: «Shark Prank»Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bus scolaire / Les mésanges charbonnières) S3 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Le bus scolaire / Les mésanges charbonnières»When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les écureuils) S2 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les écureuils»Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Animaux de nuit) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Animaux de nuit»It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le retardataire) S4 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le retardataire»The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Hero Teacher) S1 (n°47)
programme.desc: «Super Hero Teacher»Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (n°15)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile) S8 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop a Big Leak / Pups Save a Baby Anteater / Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile»The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse. // The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (n°213)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie / Jeunesse éternelle»Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots) S1 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Héros d'un jour / Danse avec les robots»A meteor hits Earth and Mister Steel's heroic demeanor forces Deer Squad to save everyone. A dance competition in Middenbos turns into a mess.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry) S1 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Potato Stew) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Potato Stew»Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire / Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire / Coule ou flotte»The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Tail Of Two Fathers) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «A Tail Of Two Fathers»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (n°51)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (n°52)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Key) S1 (n°69)
programme.desc: «The Key»Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special "dinosaur" juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le ballon de George) S4 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Le ballon de George»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course au trophée) S5 (3/20)
programme.desc: «La course au trophée»Crusher wants the trophy of the Championship race. But apparently Crusher hasn't yet learned that you have to earn a trophy first.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Maitriser la force) S1 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Maitriser la force»"When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But they'll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les ours polaires / Un costume sur mesure) S3 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Les ours polaires / Un costume sur mesure»When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al's pasture, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma) S3 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le robot-saure / Le festival de cinéma»The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Le Fan club / Le Marathon de Monsieur Métal»After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. // Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!
